alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:35PM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Starke and Marshall Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lake effect snow bands are expected to meander across this area this evening and tonight lowering totals some, but wherever it does lie, hazardous driving conditions will be possible. Due to the nature of lake effect snow, conditions can vary significantly over very short distances, going from just flurries to whiteout conditions over the span of just a few miles. This can also result in highly variable snowfall totals over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
